meanings.definition: A person who is mentally unstable or insane.
meanings.sent1: The town was abuzz with rumors about the nutters who lived in the old mansion.
meanings.sent2: The police were called to deal with a group of nutters causing a disturbance in the park.
meanings.sent3: The nutters at the circus were actually quite entertaining with their wild antics.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of thoughts, like a room full of nutters running in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie was filled with scenes of dark corridors haunted by unseen nutters.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are considered crazy or eccentric.
meanings.sent1: The nutters in the comedy club always had the audience in stitches with their jokes.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was known for its colorful characters, including a bunch of nutters who lived on the corner.
meanings.sent3: The nutters at the party were the life of the event, dancing wildly and laughing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were like a playground for the nutters, each one with a unique story to tell.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibit was a showcase of creativity, featuring works by various nutters from around the world.
